title: Add Tic Tac Toe single-file app (tic-tac-toe.html)
body:
Closes #1

Adds a self-contained Tic Tac Toe web app in a single HTML file. Features: two-player local play, keyboard navigation, win/draw detection, scoreboard persisted to localStorage, and a restart/start toggle.
head: feature/1-tic-tac-toe-single-file
